item.title: Skyrim: 23 Best Armor Mods You Should Try
item.description:
The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim is an almost perfect game in its own right, but its thriving modding community elevated it to one of the most replayed and popular games of all time. Players can find a mod to suit just about any need, from adding in a few extra items to completely overhauling the game's systems.

Armor will be a crucial part of any player's journey through Skyrim , as it offers not just protection but also some serious style points as late-game options are unlocked. Mods can certainly help buff armor if needed, but where they really shine is bringing the game's armor sets into the 2020s, with stunning reskins and spectacular custom sets. Here are some of the best armor mods to try out that can suit any player's needs, from feeling like a Spartan warrior to looking like a Met Gala attendee.

Updated on February 6, 2026, by Mark Sammut: We have added a few more Skyrim armor mods, mainly focusing on retextures.

23 Vigilant Armors and Weapons Retexture SE

Retexturing Another Mod's Armors And Weapons

  • Mod Creator: xavbio
  • Mod Link

Certain mods are so impressive and vast that they almost reach transcendence and become a game on themselves. This literally happened with The Forgotten City , but there are dozens (if not hundreds) of mods that introduce detailed quests, immersive new regions, and so much content that they can keep you engaged for the length of a short RPG. What I am trying to say is that, sometimes, these big mods inspire the creation of support mods by other community members who loved their time with the original release.

Vicn's Vigilant SE is one such mod, and it seeks to combine Skyrim with Dark Souls. This release is really impressive and well worth a playthrough if you are into FromSoftware's franchise or are just looking for a few darker quests. However, if you do not particularly love the aesthetics of the mod's weapons and armor, you can download the Vigilant Armors and Weapons Retexture mod to give them a new, sharper look.

22 Gryphonknight Regalia - Breton Noble Armor

An Armor Set Fit For A Knight

  • Mod Creator: GVLT
  • Mod Link

The Gryphonknight Regalia brings forth some new knightly armor to Skyrim , but that's not all. This greatly crafted armor set comes with its own quest to obtain it, and those who venture to Dead Crone Rock will see themselves involved in a quest with a crestfallen knight to fulfill their last wish and take their armor.

The armor itself is beautiful, and comes with variations to its design like the animated helmet and visor that provides further detail. It's great for those who want to roleplay as a lost knight from a faraway land.

21 Armors of the Velothi PT.1

A Mod For Dunmer

  • Mod Creator: Pulcharmsolis
  • Mod Link

Modder Pulcharmsolis brings forth 8 incredible Dunmer-themed armor sets for players to enjoy. All of these sets have been created from scratch, and still take a lore-friendly approach to their deigns. It's a loving mod dedicated to the lore of The Elder Scrolls and the Dunmer, so those who want to immerse themselves into the Dunmer culture can do so with this mod.

All of the sets look great in-game, and they really stand out among the metallic armors of the Nords and Imperials. The modded Dunmer armor provides new sets to experience the lands of Skyrim as an outlander, with roots in thievery, merchants, and mages to find a home within Skyrim.

20 Armor Variants Expansion

Vanilla Armor Needs Love Too

  • Mod Creator: darkgondul
  • Mod Link

Armor Variants Expansion won't exactly add new sets for players to enjoy outside of a few tweaks, but instead, the mod itself will seek to enrich the world with further immersion through new variants of vanilla armors. These armors will heighten the sense of fun thanks to level-scaling and the lore-friendly tweaks to their design.

While most of the armors might be too subtle to notice for some players, it's nice to know that not every bandit will wear the same rags, and not every warrior will have the same design, and this much-needed variety is great for immersive playthroughs.

19 Weapons Armor Clothing and Clutter Fixes

Fixing The Seams

  • Mod Creator: kryptopyr
  • Mod Link

It wouldn't be a Bethesda game without a few bugs, but that's all part of the charm and to be expected of a game this size. Whilst fans have worked to get rid of most of the bugs, there are a few harmless cosmetic ones that can be found cured with Weapons Armor Clothing and Clutter Fixes, the mod that will provide accessories and other cosmetics with fixed consistencies.

There are a multitude of immersive features for this mod that will basically allow players to use weapons, armor, clothing, and jewelry without things clipping into each other. There is more freedom in what players can wear, and customization, as well as different balances, can help to make the game feel new yet familiar.

18 Illusive Infiltrator Armor

A Low-Fantasy Armor For Stealth

  • Mod Creator: Everglaid
  • Mod Link

As most of Skyrim 's vanilla armor are fairly grounded, mods tend to prioritize sets that are a bit more lavish, eye-catching, or just plain weird. There is absolutely nothing wrong with that, but not every armor mod needs to make players look like the baddest person in Skyrim. Sometimes, a quieter and simpler look fits a build better, and the Illusive Infiltrator Armor is perfect for anyone playing as a stealth-first character.

This mod comes with two armor sets, both of which look great without screaming for attention. The armor sets are designed to fit both male and female characters as they are unisex.

17 Armor and Clothing Extension

Clothes Fit For An NPC

  • Mod Creator: kryptopyr and Gamwich
  • Mod Link

Every NPC that players come across in Skyrim feels somewhat familiar, and that's probably because they all share a handful of voice actors and clothing. The fact that the library of clothes isn't the most diverse in Skyrim can sometimes take away from its incredible immersion, so downloading Armor and Clothing Extension might help the process somewhat.

This mod will provide the citizens and NPCs of Skyrim with more lore-friendly clothing options that they can wear based on where they are and what rank they are. Players also have access to these lore-friendly outfits, allowing the world to feel more lived-in and unique than it already is.

16 Conditional Armor Type Animations

A Mod That Makes Different Armor Feel More Special

  • Mod Creator: Verolevi
  • Mod Link

Immersion is important to Skyrim, and whilst the vanilla experience aids immersion so well, there are some mods that just enrich it further. Conditional Armor Type Animations might not add any new armors to the game, but they will definitely make players feel powerful or vulnerable, depending on what they are wearing due to the interesting detail of this mod.

Conditional Armor Type Animations focuses on more animations for Skyrim , adding a bit more novelty and personality to each armor decision. With these new animations, which require Open Animation Replacer, players will move differently depending on the armor they are wearing to further influence and feel what they are wearing.

15 Warmonger Armory

Good Quantity Of New Armor

  • Mod Creator: Batmanna
  • Mod Link

It's time to add even more immersion to Skyrim with the Warmonger Armory mod, which will add even more lore-friendly armors to the base game. Through armor, weapons, and clothes, Skyrim will see an influx of designs influenced and inspired by The Elder Scrolls series, no matter the harshness of Tamriel's climates and eras.

GR Report: Subscribe and never miss what matters

Level up your gaming knowledge with Game Rant, packed with news, reviews, and insights from the gaming world.
By subscribing, you agree to receive newsletter and marketing emails, and accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. You can unsubscribe anytime.

There is an impressive amount of armor found with this mod, so players who are looking to stand out from the crowd and don't want to be overpowered by wearing Daedric Hearts or Dragon Bones will certainly want to check this one out and venture through the harsh and cold lands with plenty of choice in attire.

14 Improved Closefaced Helmets

Minor Change That Makes A Big Difference

  • Mod Creator: navida1
  • Mod Link

Bring further immersion to Tamriel with Improved Close-Faced Helmets, a mod that makes minor improvements to the helmets so that players can see the eyes from the outside. Most helmets are included, and every race is able to have its own mesh revealed.

This helps make it so that not every armor is the same, as players will be able to see the eyes of NPCs and even their own characters through the faceplates of helmets, instead of just a solid black line to hide the textures underneath.

item.title: There Are 2 New Switch 2 Exclusives Releasing Next Week, And They Couldn't Be More Different
item.description:
Two games exclusive to the Nintendo Switch 2 , Tokyo Scramble and Mario Tennis Fever , will be releasing back-to-back on February 11 and 12, respectively. The diversity of games available on the Nintendo Switch 2 has helped the hybrid console gain a lot of popularity since its release last June. The next two console exclusives could help keep that momentum moving forward, as their themes, visuals, and content make for a stark contrast to one another.

While the original Nintendo Switch just became the company's best-selling console of all time, with more than 155 million units sold since its launch in March 2017, its successor is on a trajectory that could potentially leave it in the dust. Earnings reports from Nintendo show that the Switch 2 had moved more than 17.3 million units by December 31, 2025, making it the fastest-selling video game console ever made. While there were some initial complaints about the threadbare nature of its catalog during its launch last June, Nintendo and third-party developers have beefed up the library considerably since then, and two exclusive entries coming in the second week of February 2026 show off the breadth of the Switch 2's growing library.

Mario Tennis Fever Launches on February 12

Of the two console exclusives making their debuts soon, Mario Tennis Fever , releasing on February 12, comes with the most fanfare. Developed by Camelot Software Planning, the studio behind several previous Mario Tennis and Mario Golf titles, the next sports game starring Mario and his crew will feature the special additions of 30 different Fever Rackets, allowing players to add a number of special effects and conditions to their matches through powerful Fever Shots. After building up their meters by participating in rallies, Mario Tennis Fever 's Fever Rackets will allow players to break the traditional rules of the sport through mechanics that include creating a doppleganger of their character, sending a Pokey onto the court to trip opponents up, covering portions of the field of play with fire or ice, or just knocking their opponents out by wiping out their HP meters.

A roster of 38 familiar Mario characters has been confirmed for Mario Tennis Fever , including the Mario brothers, Bowser, Yoshi, Peach, Daisy, Toad, Wario, Waluigi, Donkey and Diddy Kong, and a slew of generic Mario series enemies. There have also been four different game modes confirmed for Mario Tennis Fever , with players able to participate in Tournament, Adventure, and Trial Towers modes, along with Mix it Up, a highly customizable game mode that lets players set up a variety of special rules for their matches. Considering that this will be the first Mario Tennis game released since 2018's Mario Tennis Aces on the original Switch, which sold 4.5 million units by the end of 2022, it's likely to prove itself as a popular Mario sports entry with fans.

Tokyo Scramble Launches on February 11

The other Switch 2 exclusive game for the second week of February is Tokyo Scramble , an unorthodox survival puzzle action game set in the subterranean underground of Japan's capital city. Playing as cheery high school student Ann and accompanied by her professional dancer brother Ray, players will need to utilize quick thinking to evade Zinos, mysterious dinosaur-like creatures that inhabit the caverns under Tokyo. In a strange blending of game genres, players will have to assess their enemies for weaknesses and keep cool heads in order to reach their goal of making it back above ground. Tokyo Scramble launches on February 11.

Potential players haven't had a lot of time to prepare for the arrival of Tokyo Scramble , as it was only just announced during the Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase on February 5. With less than a week between its announcement and launch, it's hard to say how gamers will react to such a bizarre combination of genres, but developer Adglobe's contributions to past games like Brave Frontier 2 and Fate/Grand Order may inspire some confidence that their next venture will be a success on Switch 2.

Mario Tennis Fever

Join Mario and friends for over-the-top tennis mayhem! Use topspins, slices, lobs, and other familiar shotsalong with other fancy footwork and new defensive maneuversto outpace your opponents on the court. Keep a rally going, build up your Fever Gauge, and unleash powerful Fever Shots that can be augmented with special effects by equipping Fever Rackets!

Freeze the court with the Ice Racket, summon mushrooms that shrink opponents with the Mini Mushroom Racket, duplicate yourself with the Shadow Racket, and more. Mix and match 30 different Fever Rackets with 38 playable characters, the most in series history, to find a strategy that works for you.

Serve up casual or competitive play in a variety of game modes

Get play-by-play commentary from a Talking Flower in Tournament mode, test your skills and complete various objectives in Trial Towers mode, or take on matches with unexpected rulesand even some Wonder Effectsin Mix it Up mode. Hop online* for casual bouts with customizable rules with an Online Room or go for glory in competitive Ranked Matches. You can even gently swing your Joy-Con 2 controller like a racket for a more authentic experience in Swing Mode.

Experience a story in which Mario and friends, encountering monsters on a remote island, find themselves transformed into babies! Help them relearn their tennis skills and defeat the monsters to return to normal in Adventure mode.

Genre(s)
Sports, RPG

item.title: Nioh 3: How to Emote
item.description:
Gestures in soulslike titles serve as a universal language, allowing players to convey appreciation or excitement during tense online encounters. In the Nioh series, this system has always been a fan favorite feature for interacting with both allies and the environment. Nioh 3 continues this tradition, offering a wide array of gestures for players to utilize as they journey through its dangerous world.

Whether you are celebrating a hard-fought victory against a boss or greeting a visitor in the world of Nioh 3 , knowing how to emote is essential for any player.

How to Emote in Nioh 3

Emoting is a feature that the game introduces fairly early on. As a matter of fact, the game even gives you a small tutorial during the first section, but most players might forget it after putting a couple of hours into the game.

To emote, you have to press R1/RB on your controller along with the Options/Start button . This will display a gesture tab where you can choose the gestures you have. You can also change tabs to find more gestures. On a keyboard, press G to open the gesture tab, then press Space to lock in your pick .

When it comes to finding more gestures or actually using these during the game aside from multiplayer interactions, you will need to loot chests. There are fixed chests in the game from which a mimic can pop out and clone itself to look exactly like you.

It will then gesture in front of you, and you can fight it using any style. However, there is an alternative way of dealing with the mimic without even fighting it, and that involves performing the same gesture the mimic did.

Remember to not take a lot of time, because the mimic will run out of patience and start attacking you.

Once you either defeat or please the mimic with gestures, it will go away. You will get a bunch of loot, plus you might also get a gesture that will be added to your collection.

Players who want to know how to remove Life Corrosion can check out this guide.

Nioh 3

item.title: One of the Best Games on Xbox Game Pass Just Got a Big Upgrade
item.description:
Xbox Game Pass fans received some great news from indie developer Team Cherry as the original Hollow Knight is now available on Xbox Series X/S and original owners can get the upgrade completely for free. Hollow Knight originally launched all the way back in 2017, after a very successful Kickstarter campaign that saw the game cruise past its financial goal, eventually reaching an even bigger audience on the Xbox Game Pass service as well. From there, the franchise has become a massive hit, with Team Cherry not only porting the original game to a variety of platforms but making its DLC content completely free for owners as well.

Hollow Knight's financial and commercial success led the studio to start work on another entry, which was originally designed to be an expansion but quickly expanded beyond that scope into its own game. After a lengthy development cycle with long periods of total silence, Hollow Knight: Silksong launched in 2025 to huge acclaim, winning multiple end-of-year awards and again proving to be a big financial boon for Team Cherry. However, for all that success, Team Cherry is giving fans new and old a big reason to return to the lands of Hallownest.

In a post on social media, Team Cherry announced that the original Hollow Knight is available now on next generation consoles, including PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch 2. The new version takes advantage of Silksong 's various upgrades , giving players a higher resolution and frame-rate, added visual effects, and "additional updates and refinements." Better yet, this update is available completely for free for those who already own the game on a previous platform like the PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox One.

Interestingly enough, this offer also extends to Xbox Game Pass subscribers as both Hollow Knight and Silksong are available through the service. For those who have downloaded it already or as part of their collection, the upgrade will also apply to this version as well, so players can take advantage of all these new features and performance improvements.

The update comes right on the heels of yesterday's Hollow Knight Switch 2 Edition announcement during Nintendo's Partner Direct. Considering it was a Nintendo-specific presentation, the reveal gave the impression that it was specific to the Switch 2, but thanks to Team Cherry, the upgrade is available everywhere. In fact, the studio teased this update late last year in a new blog post, indicating that Team Cherry was hard at work at bringing the original game up to the standard that Silksong set. At that time, no timetable was given for the update, only that it would add features and fix bugs.

It's a great time to jump into the Hollow Knight franchise, whether with the original game's recent upgrade or through Silksong which only just launched a few months ago. Team Cherry is already working on its planned DLC, teasing the Sea of Sorrow expansion for Hollow Knight Silksong late last year. Following in the footsteps of its predecessor, Sea of Sorrow will be given out to players for free and while Team Cherry hasn't revealed a release window for the new content, the plan is for it to arrive sometime in 2026. However, considering how long Silksong was in development, anything could be possible.

Hollow Knight Version 1.5.12459 Patch Notes

  • Added support for 21:9 & 16:10 resolutions.
  • Game now pauses while in inventory menus.
  • Upgraded to Unity Input System for broader controller support (original input system is still available, if preferred, via Options>Controller>Advanced Settings)
  • Added dithering effect, and dithering options, to reduce colour banding.
  • Fixed a softlock in City of Tears Grub room.
  • Reduced Grey Prince Zote's stagger bounce height.
  • Updated Sly's Great Slash collider to closer match visual.
  • Salubra's Blessing now deactivates after reaching max Soul.
  • Map panning is now smoother.
  • Various performance improvements.
  • Various smaller fixes and tweaks.

Hollow Knight

item.title: The Legend of Khiimori - Official Developer Gameplay Overview Trailer
item.description: The Legend of Khiimori, Aesir Interactive's upcoming action-adventure exploration game, lays out its open world and equestrian mechanics. The Legend of Khiimori launches in early access on March 3, 2026, for PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.
